update SPM_SUPPLY
SUPPLY_TYPE = #{supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_ORG_ID = #{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUNTRY_CODE = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE_CODE = #{stateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INV_ORG_ID = #{invOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFAULT_FLAG = #{defaultFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SUPPLY_ID = #{supplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SPM_SUPPLY set SUPPLY_TYPE = #{supplyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_ORG_ID = #{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNTRY_CODE = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE_CODE = #{stateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INV_ORG_ID = #{invOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_FLAG = #{defaultFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SUPPLY_ID = #{supplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT s.supply_id, s.supply_type, s.sales_org_id, s.inv_org_id, s.default_flag FROM spm_supply s
s.SALES_ORG_ID = #{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and s.default_flag = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT smb.COMPANY_ID FROM spm_supply ss ,SPM_MARKET_B smb ,SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B ssob WHERE smb.MARKET_ID = ssob.MARKET_ID AND ss.SALES_ORG_ID = ssob.SALES_ORG_ID AND ss.INV_ORG_ID = #{invOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT scb.ATTRIBUTE3 FROM SPM_COMPANY_B scb , SPM_MARKET_B smb WHERE scb.COMPANY_ID = smb.COMPANY_ID AND smb.MARKET_ID = #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT sup.inv_org_id ,siot.name inv_org_name ,siob.code inv_org_code FROM spm_supply sup LEFT JOIN spm_inv_organization_b siob ON sup.inv_org_id = siob.inv_org_id LEFT JOIN spm_inv_organization_tl siot ON siot.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND siot.inv_org_id = siob.inv_org_id LEFT JOIN spm_location sl ON 1=1 LEFT join om_sales_order om on om.delivery_location_id = sl.location_id WHERE sup.supply_type = 'SITE' AND om.delivery_type = 'SHIPP' AND om.header_id = #{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND sup.country_code = sl.country_code AND sup.state_code = sl.state_code AND sup.city_code = sl.city_code UNION SELECT sup.inv_org_id ,siot.name inv_org_name ,siob.code inv_org_code FROM spm_supply sup LEFT JOIN spm_inv_organization_b siob ON sup.inv_org_id = siob.inv_org_id LEFT JOIN spm_inv_organization_tl siot ON siot.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND siot.inv_org_id = siob.inv_org_id LEFT JOIN spm_location sl ON 1=1 left join om_sales_order om on om.delivery_location_id = sl.location_id WHERE sup.supply_type = 'SITE' AND om.delivery_type = 'SHIPP' AND om.header_id = #{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND sup.country_code = sl.country_code AND sup.state_code = sl.state_code UNION SELECT sup.inv_org_id ,siot.name inv_org_name ,siob.code inv_org_code FROM spm_supply sup LEFT JOIN spm_inv_organization_b siob ON sup.inv_org_id = siob.inv_org_id LEFT JOIN spm_inv_organization_tl siot ON siot.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND siot.inv_org_id = siob.inv_org_id LEFT JOIN spm_location sl ON 1=1 left join om_sales_order om on om.delivery_location_id = sl.location_id WHERE sup.supply_type = 'SITE' AND om.delivery_type = 'SHIPP' AND om.header_id = #{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND sup.country_code = sl.country_code UNION SELECT sup.inv_org_id ,siot.name inv_org_name ,siob.code inv_org_code FROM spm_supply sup LEFT JOIN spm_inv_organization_b siob ON sup.inv_org_id = siob.inv_org_id LEFT JOIN spm_inv_organization_tl siot ON siot.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND siot.inv_org_id = siob.inv_org_id left join om_sales_order om ON 1=1 WHERE sup.supply_type = 'ORG' AND om.header_id = #{orderHeaderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND sup.sales_org_id = om.sales_org_id
